name: vina userbot
description: a telegram userbot based on pyrogram and telethon

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

MONGO_URI.description: this is needed for database account.

PYROGRAM_SESSION.description: Pyrogram String Session, Get it by Running python3 -m session

TELETHON_SESSION.description: Pyrogram String Session, Get it by Running python3 -m session

LOG_CHAT.description: make a public/private group, generate the id and fill in here,

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku App Name yang kamu isi paling awal di paling atas.

HEROKU_API.description: Heroku API Key milik mu, Temukan di https://dashboard.heroku.com/account
